verses.roman:
yata loka āila mahāprabhuke dekhite
nānā-grāma haite, āra navadvīpa haite

synonyms: yata loka—all the people; āila—came; mahāprabhuke—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dekhite—to see; nānā-grāma haite—from various villages; āra—and; navadvīpa haite—from Navadvīpa.
translation: People came to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu from various other villages nearby, as well as Navadvīpa.
